sentences.english: People make fun of her because she always speaks foolishly.

sentences.english: Silly mistakes and queer clothes often arouse ridicule.

definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
(of a girl) to feign anger coquettishly
to wail at a funeral/formal wailing while offering sacrifice to the departed
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
